mapper.select: SELECT c.id, name as writer, title, c.regdate, viewCount FROM hguclub.communityInfo as c INNER JOIN hguclub.user as u ON c.userId = u.id;

SELECT cI.id, name as writer, title, content, cI.regdate,viewCount, originalUrl, realUrl, cIF.order FROM hguclub.communityInfo as cI ,hguclub.user u,hguclub.communityInfoFile as cIF WHERE cI.userId = u.id and cI.id = #{id} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hguclub.communityInfo (userId, title, content) VALUES (#{userId}, #{title}, #{content});
